channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bandit
item.description:
#Connect to WeChall #Shift + Insert to Paste with Windows (putty)

export WECHALLUSER=“meerkat96”;export WECHALLTOKEN=“5D7C1-1FAEC-0EDF8-7FF90-7EE38-553D1”;wechall

#Bandit0 -> 1: bandit0 /bandit0 cat readme

#Bandit 1 -> 2: bandit1 / ZjLjTmM6FvvyRnrb2rfNWOZOTa6ip5If cat ./-

#Bandit 2 ->3: bandit2 / 263JGJPfgU6LtdEvgfWU1XP5yac29mFx cat “spaces in this filename”

#Bandit 3 -> 4: bandit3 / MNk8KNH3Usiio41PRUEoDFPqfxLPlSmx ls -A cat /home/bandit3/inhere/…Hiding-From-You

#Bandit 4 ->5: bandit4 / 2WmrDFRmJIq3IPxneAaMGhap0pFhF3NJ ls inhere cat ./-file07

#Bandit 5->6: bandit5 / 4oQYVPkxZOOEOO5pTW81FB8j8lxXGUQw find inhere -type f -size 1033c

#Bandit 6->7: bandit6 / HWasnPhtq9AVKe0dmk45nxy20cvUa6EG find / -type f -user bandit7 -group bandit6 -size 33c 2>/dev/null

#Bandit 7->8: bandit7 / morbNTDkSW6jIlUc0ymOdMaLnOlFVAaj grep “millionth” data.txt

#Bandit 8->9: bandit8 / dfwvzFQi4mU0wfNbFOe9RoWskMLg7eEc sort data.txt | uniq -u

#Bandit 9->10: bandit9 /4CKMh1JI91bUIZZPXDqGanal4xvAg0JM strings data.txt | grep “====”

#Bandit 10->11: bandit10 / FGUW5ilLVJrxX9kMYMmlN4MgbpfMiqey cat data.txt | base64 -d

#Bandit 11->12: bandit11 /dtR173fZKb0RRsDFSGsg2RWnpNVj3qRr cat data.txt | tr ‘A-Za-z’ ‘N-ZA-Mn-za-m’

#Bandit 12->13: bandit12 / 7x16WNeHIi5YkIhWsfFIqoognUTyj9Q4 cd /tmp TMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d) && cd “$TMP_DIR” cp /home/bandit12/data.txt ./
mv data.txt data.hex
xxd -r data.hex > data.bin #hex -> binary file data.bin mv data.bin data.gz gunzip data.gz bzip2 -d data.bz2 tar -xf data.tar unzip data.zip

#Bandit 13->14: bandit13 / FO5dwFsc0cbaIiH0h8J2eUks2vdTDwAn ssh -i sshkey.private bandit14@localhost -p 2220

#Bandit 14->15: bandit14 / MU4VWeTyJk8ROof1qqmcBPaLh7lDCPvS echo “MU4VWeTyJk8ROof1qqmcBPaLh7lDCPvS” | nc localhost 30000

#Bandit 15->16: bandit15 /8xCjnmgoKbGLhHFAZlGE5Tmu4M2tKJQo echo “8xCjnmgoKbGLhHFAZlGE5Tmu4M2tKJQo” | openssl s_client -connect localhost:30001 -quiet

#Bandit 16->17: bandit16 / kSkvUpMQ7lBYyCM4GBPvCvT1BfWRy0Dx

nmap -p 31000-32000 localhost echo " KEY—– (paste all private key here) —–END RSA PRIVATE KEY—–" > bandit17_key chmod 600 bandit17_key ssh -i bandit17_key bandit17@bandit.labs.overthewire.org -p 2220

#Bandit 17->18 diff passwords.old passwords.new

#Bandit 18->19: bandit18/ x2gLTTjFwMOhQ8oWNbMN362QKxfRqGlO ssh bandit18@bandit.labs.overthewire.org -p 2220 -t “bash –noprofile –norc”

#Bandit 19->20: bandit19 / cGWpMaKXVwDUNgPAVJbWYuGHVn9zl3j8
